name: ContMDiffMap.coe_mul
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹² : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝¹¹ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝¹⁰ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
E' : Type u_3
inst✝⁹ : NormedAddCommGroup E'
inst✝⁸ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E'
H : Type u_4
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
H' : Type u_5
inst✝⁶ : TopologicalSpace H'
I' : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E' H'
N : Type u_6
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace N
inst✝⁴ : ChartedSpace H N
n : WithTop ENat
G : Type u_10
inst✝³ : Mul G
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace G
inst✝¹ : ChartedSpace H' G
inst✝ : ContMDiffMul I' n G
f g : ContMDiffMap I I' N G n
⊢ Eq (⇑(HMul.hMul f g)) (HMul.hMul ⇑f ⇑g)
decl:
@[to_additive (attr := simp)]
theorem coe_mul {G : Type*} [Mul G] [TopologicalSpace G] [ChartedSpace H' G] [ContMDiffMul I' n G]
    (f g : C^n⟮I, N; I', G⟯) : ⇑(f * g) = f * g :=
  rfl

inst✝ : ContMDiffMul I' n G
a✝ : ContMDiffMap I I' N G n
a : N
⊢ Eq (ContMDiffMap.coeFnMonoidHom a✝ a) (a✝ a)
decl:
/-- Coercion to a function as a `MonoidHom`. Similar to `MonoidHom.coeFn`. -/
@[to_additive (attr := simps) "Coercion to a function as an `AddMonoidHom`.
  Similar to `AddMonoidHom.coeFn`."]
def coeFnMonoidHom {G : Type*} [Monoid G] [TopologicalSpace G] [ChartedSpace H' G]
    [ContMDiffMul I' n G] : C^n⟮I, N; I', G⟯ →* N → G where
  toFun := DFunLike.coe
  map_one' := coe_one
  map_mul' := coe_mul

inst✝ : NormedSpace 𝕜 V
r : 𝕜
g : ContMDiffMap I'' (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 V) N' V n
h : ContMDiffMap I I'' N N' n
⊢ Eq ((HSMul.hSMul r g).comp h) (HSMul.hSMul r (g.comp h))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem smul_comp {V : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup V] [NormedSpace 𝕜 V] (r : 𝕜)
    (g : C^n⟮I'', N'; 𝓘(𝕜, V), V⟯) (h : C^n⟮I, N; I'', N'⟯) : (r • g).comp h = r • g.comp h :=
  rfl

name: ContMDiffMap.coeFnLinearMap_apply
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁶ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝⁵ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_4
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
N : Type u_6
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace N
inst✝² : ChartedSpace H N
n : WithTop ENat
V : Type u_10
inst✝¹ : NormedAddCommGroup V
inst✝ : NormedSpace 𝕜 V
a✝ : ContMDiffMap I (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 V) N V n
a : N
⊢ Eq (ContMDiffMap.coeFnLinearMap a✝ a) (a✝ a)
decl:
/-- Coercion to a function as a `LinearMap`. -/
@[simps]
def coeFnLinearMap {V : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup V] [NormedSpace 𝕜 V] :
    C^n⟮I, N; 𝓘(𝕜, V), V⟯ →ₗ[𝕜] N → V :=
  { (coeFnAddMonoidHom : C^n⟮I, N; 𝓘(𝕜, V), V⟯ →+ _) with
    toFun := (↑)
    map_smul' := coe_smul }

name: ContMDiffMap.coeFnAlgHom_apply
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝⁸ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁷ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝⁶ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_4
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
N : Type u_6
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace N
inst✝³ : ChartedSpace H N
n : WithTop ENat
A : Type u_10
inst✝² : NormedRing A
inst✝¹ : NormedAlgebra 𝕜 A
inst✝ : ContMDiffRing (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 A) n A
a✝ : ContMDiffMap I (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 A) N A n
a : N
⊢ Eq (ContMDiffMap.coeFnAlgHom a✝ a) (a✝ a)
decl:
/-- Coercion to a function as an `AlgHom`. -/
@[simps]
def coeFnAlgHom : C^n⟮I, N; 𝓘(𝕜, A), A⟯ →ₐ[𝕜] N → A where
  toFun := (↑)
  commutes' _ := rfl
  -- `(ContMDiffMap.coeFnRingHom : C^n⟮I, N; 𝓘(𝕜, A), A⟯ →+* _) with` times out for some reason
  map_zero' := ContMDiffMap.coe_zero
  map_one' := ContMDiffMap.coe_one
  map_add' := ContMDiffMap.coe_add
  map_mul' := ContMDiffMap.coe_mul

name: ContMDiffMap.smul_comp'
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹² : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝¹¹ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝¹⁰ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_4
inst✝⁹ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
N : Type u_6
inst✝⁸ : TopologicalSpace N
inst✝⁷ : ChartedSpace H N
E'' : Type u_7
inst✝⁶ : NormedAddCommGroup E''
inst✝⁵ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E''
H'' : Type u_8
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace H''
I'' : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E'' H''
N' : Type u_9
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace N'
inst✝² : ChartedSpace H'' N'
n : WithTop ENat
V : Type u_10
inst✝¹ : NormedAddCommGroup V
inst✝ : NormedSpace 𝕜 V
f : ContMDiffMap I'' (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 𝕜) N' 𝕜 n
g : ContMDiffMap I'' (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 V) N' V n
h : ContMDiffMap I I'' N N' n
⊢ Eq ((HSMul.hSMul f g).comp h) (HSMul.hSMul (f.comp h) (g.comp h))
decl:
/-- The left multiplication with a `C^n` scalar function commutes with composition. -/
@[simp]
theorem smul_comp' {V : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup V] [NormedSpace 𝕜 V] (f : C^n⟮I'', N'; 𝕜⟯)
    (g : C^n⟮I'', N'; 𝓘(𝕜, V), V⟯) (h : C^n⟮I, N; I'', N'⟯) :
    (f • g).comp h = f.comp h • g.comp h :=
  rfl
